Text:

It has a password, I cant even uninstall it

am looking for one which works with Win7..??

Yeah, it seems to be a great program Kentucky-Kid, only problem is that the serials are not functional.  Would it be possible to get a a few more, it would be appreciated.  Thank you kindly.

Pierce

Most of the folder protect program i have seen were protecting the files only in normal mode.

I mean, the files were still freely accessible when the computer was started in safe mode.

Is it the case with this one too?
